source: TEXT_BANSYL303_01279_SEQ_00<tab>Moxia gazes wistfully in your direction.

TEXT_BANSYL303_01279_SEQ_01<tab>Moxia relates to you the tragic tale of the ancient ones, guardians of the forest whose once-kindly hearts have been poisoned by the rampant contamination of the Sylphlands. Fighting back tears, she bids you slay the great trees and obtain three acorns.
target: TEXT_BANSYL303_01279_SEQ_01<tab>L'air pollué a rendu <var 08 ((<var 28 ((BNpcName)) A407 /var>)) ((folles)) ((fous)) /var> les <var 33 ((BNpcName)) 0DA40302 /var> qui étaient autrefois ami<var 08 ((<var 28 ((BNpcName)) A407 /var>)) ((es)) ((s)) /var> des Sylphes du Refuge. Il n'y a pas d'autre solution que de les tuer pour récupérer leurs glands afin de les faire repousser. Moxia vous a demandé de lui en rapporter trois.

source: TEXT_BANSYL303_01279_SEQ_02<tab>You have put the sentinels out of their suffering, and obtained three acorns in the process. Next, obtain three phials of water from the springs in the vicinity of the Seedbed and the Hanging Barbs.
target: TEXT_BANSYL303_01279_SEQ_02<tab>Vous avez obtenu les trois glands demandés par Moxia. Il vous faut maintenant puiser trois fioles d'eau d'une source proche du Berceau ou des Piques pendues.

source: TEXT_BANSYL303_01279_SEQ_03<tab>Water and acorns in hand, return to Little Solace and hand the items over to Moxia.
target: TEXT_BANSYL303_01279_SEQ_03<tab>Vous avez les trois fioles d'eau. Vous pouvez maintenant retourner au Refuge pour donner les trois glands et l'eau à Moxia.

source: TEXT_BANSYL303_01279_SEQ_04<tab>Though saddened at the sentinels' fate, Moxia is resolved to honor their memory by planting a new generation of gentle guardians. You have again proven yourself a friend to Little Solace, and this is surely not the last time the sylphs will beseech your aid.
target: TEXT_BANSYL303_01279_SEQ_04<tab>Les glands et l'eau ont satisfait Moxia, qui espère maintenant pouvoir élever les sentinelles à l'abri de la pollution des Dénaturés.

source: TEXT_BANSYL303_01279_TODO_00<tab>Slay Sylphlands sentinels and obtain sentinel acorns.
TEXT_BANSYL303_01279_TODO_01<tab>Obtain deepspring water from the Sylphlands springs.
target: TEXT_BANSYL303_01279_TODO_01<tab>Puiser de l'eau dans les Terres sylphes

source: TEXT_BANSYL303_01279_TODO_02<tab>Deliver the acorns and the water to Moxia.
target: TEXT_BANSYL303_01279_TODO_02<tab>Apporter les <var 33 ((EventItem)) 0DF61E89100302 /var> et les <var 33 ((EventItem)) 0DF61E89110302 /var> à Moxia au Refuge

source: TEXT_BANSYL303_01279_MOXIA_000_000<tab>O, ancient ones, kindly ones... <sob> Forgive these ones...
target:
TEXT_BANSYL303_01279_MOXIA_000_000Les sont nos amies,
ce sont des animaux végétaux très gentils.

source: TEXT_BANSYL303_01279_MOXIA_000_001<tab>Does brave one know? Since long before walking ones walked this place, these ones have kept the company of the trees. The gentlest of the trees were the ancient ones. The ancient ones watched over these ones, and kept these ones safe.
target:
TEXT_BANSYL303_01279_MOXIA_000_001Mais les Dénaturés polluent l'air de la forêt,
elles sont devenues folles et enragées.

source: TEXT_BANSYL303_01279_MOXIA_000_002<tab>...Then touched ones began to fill the forest with clouds of poison and hate. Ancient ones turned to gnarled, twisted ones, and once-gentle branches came crashing and lashing at these ones, that ancient ones once did love and protect.
target:
TEXT_BANSYL303_01279_MOXIA_000_002C'est très triste, mais il va falloir les tuer,
car ainsi leurs glands, nous pourrons récupérer.
Ils nous permettront de les replanter.

source: TEXT_BANSYL303_01279_MOXIA_000_003<tab>It is too late to save ancient ones, but there is still a way to save what ancient ones once were. First, though it pains this one's heart, this one must ask brave one to end ancient ones' suffering.
target:
TEXT_BANSYL303_01279_MOXIA_000_003)) (( )) 02 /var>, pourrais-tu en vaincre trois?
Ce sera suffisant, je le crois.

source: TEXT_BANSYL303_01279_MOXIA_000_004<tab>After doing so, this one asks brave one to bring back ancient ones' seed-corns, along with three phials of deepspring water.
target:
TEXT_BANSYL303_01279_MOXIA_000_004Il faudrait ensuite puiser trois fioles d'eau,
dans une source près des Piques pendues ou du Berceau.

source: TEXT_BANSYL303_01279_MOXIA_000_005<tab>The springs by the Seedbed or the Hanging Barbs should suffice, this one thinks, but be wary─naughty ones abound.
target:
TEXT_BANSYL303_01279_MOXIA_000_005Cette eau est essentielle,
pour le développement des sentinelles.
Sois prudent toutefois,
les Dénaturés rôdent toujours dans les bois!

source: TEXT_BANSYL303_01279_MOXIA_000_010<tab>This one asks that brave one bring back ancient ones' seed-corns, along with three phials of fresh water from deep spring. So will the cycle of life begin anew.
target:
TEXT_BANSYL303_01279_MOXIA_000_010Ces sentinelles folles, tues-en trois.
Ce sera suffisant, je le crois.
Il faudrait ensuite puiser trois fioles d'eau,
dans une source près des Piques pendues ou du Berceau.

source: TEXT_BANSYL303_01279_MOXIA_000_020<tab>Did brave one bring the...<sniffle>...acorns and water that this one seeks?
target:
TEXT_BANSYL303_01279_MOXIA_000_020As-tu les glands et l'eau que j'ai demandés?
C'est une triste tâche, je le sais...

source: TEXT_BANSYL303_01279_MOXIA_000_021<tab>Brave one is strong indeed to quiet the ancient ones. This one is most grateful.
target:
TEXT_BANSYL303_01279_MOXIA_000_021Merci, grâce à toi nous pourrons planter,
de nouvelles sentinelles, et bien les élever.

source: TEXT_BANSYL303_01279_MOXIA_000_022<tab>These ones must never forget the ancient ones' kindness, but it is time for the cycle of life to begin anew. Yes, this one is certain.
target:
TEXT_BANSYL303_01279_MOXIA_000_022Nous prendrons bien soin de les conserver,
loin des Dénaturés et leur air empoisonné!
